item.title: Tip: Gadgets, Deals And Stuff You Need To Know - Part III
item.description: This is the last part in this series. So far we’ve seen how to select the gadget and how to get the best price for it. This time we’ll fill in the last remaining piece of the puzzle, the minor tit-bits that go a long way in preventing a lot of heart-burn. Don’t worry this is a short one. This last piece is to make sure that the place that you decided upon to buy your gadget, is OK in all respects, i.
